hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #storm within Gerudo's Fortress# reveals a #generic grotto#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the path to #Volvagia#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that winning the #treasure chest game# rewards #a Blue Rupee#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Prelude of Light#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Strength Upgrade#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find #the Shadow Temple#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the path of #the hero#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that a #storm in the valley# reveals a #generic grotto#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that past a #silver block in the Spirit Temple# boulders and a melody conceal...^ #a Small Key# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: Have you embraced the power of the Deku Nut yet?

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #the enemy souls of Hyrule Field#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #the Kokiri Sword# and #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##Zora's Fountain## has #1# major item.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: @ tries to read the Gossip Stone...^${12 48 06}but he's standing on the wrong side of it!

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #the Biggoron Sword# and #the enemy souls of Water Tempe#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that the Zora's Domain #diving game and torch run# lead to...^ #a Strength Upgrade# and #a Huge Rupee#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.
